column1: #Text=They have the boat ready to leave .
#Text=Why are n't you all packed yet ?
#Text=" Pema says : " The kids and I have been talking and we decided we want to stay .
#Text=This is our city and it 's going to need all the help it can get .
#Text=I 'm sure Prince Wu could use your help with the evacuation .
#Text=And you three can help the other airbenders keep an eye on the Earth Empire troops from above .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Kuvira 's gon na rue the day she messed with Meelo .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I still do n't like having to abandon my office in the city .
